Articles.Content:
So, I thought it might be a good idea to begin a thread for any and all questions/topics concerning the sequel to Kerbal Space Program. Please reply. with your thoughts on the number one burning question's you feel require an answer and help to compile a list.

I for one would like to know when we're next going to get an update on development details;..... are there going to be regular dev diaries like the days of old, or can we expect radio silence until release?

 

Comment Bellow
What OSes will it run on.
